content:
Currently we have quite complex way to switch the modes (i.e day mode and night mode). We have to go to settings>display settings>color scheme or we also have one markdown for it (i.e /day & /night in compose box) but they both are not very easy to notice. Can we have a shortcut toggle button somewhere, where user can easily notice it?
Matrix shows that button like this: daymode_nightmode-button.png

I will push back on this a little bit. Usually it's a one-time change, and people who like night mode seem to be sufficiently motivated to find it in the settings. (Just to reveal my bias, I don't use night mode.)
